title: Summoner Icons not displaying on Boards?
body:
I have a problem for a few days in these forums where the summoner icons of me and the other users are not appearing and instead it shows a black box with a gray questionmark, is there a fix to this


https://avatar.leagueoflegends.com/na/Elfezen.png

replies.body: That's pretty strange that's happening to you! I see your Icon at this present moment, but if you're not seeing it I would suggest clearing your cache/cookies? Not sure what could be the issue causing this, but this may fix the issue up for you.

> [{quoted}](name=GoldPikaKnight,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=kEtNtM5A,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-26T22:37:24.369+0000)
>
> That's pretty strange that's happening to you! I see your Icon at this present moment, but if you're not seeing it I would suggest clearing your cache/cookies? Not sure what could be the issue causing this, but this may fix the issue up for you.

Thanks it got fixed by itself now for some reason without doing anything, i always avoid deleting cookies and cache because then i have to relogin all the internet stuff
